openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.database.query

Interface IQueryer


  • public interface IQueryer
    Author:
    dailey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends IMessage>
      T      		 query(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass, java.io.Serializable messageId, java.util.Locale locale)
      query entity which implemented IMessage by message id and locale.
      it is best use it when the implements is by ORM framework like Hibernate etc.
      java.lang.String query(java.lang.String tableName, java.io.Serializable messageId, java.util.Locale locale)
      query message content by tableName and message id, locale.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        <T extends IMessage> T query(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
                             java.io.Serializable messageId,
                             java.util.Locale locale)
        query entity which implemented IMessage by message id and locale.
        it is best use it when the implements is by ORM framework like Hibernate etc.
        Parameters:
        entityClass - corresponding database table
        messageId - message id
        locale - message locale
        T - IMessage
        Returns:
        IMessage
